{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|玉|元|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|t1=jade}} – ancient toys made of jade.

===Pronunciation 1===
{{zh-pron
|m=wán,er=y
|c=waan4-2,waan4,faan2
|c_note=waan4-2 - common; waan4 - rare; faan2 - variant, perhaps dialectal influence
|h=pfs=ngòan
|h_note=ngòan - literary (“to play”)
|md=nguàng
|md_note=nguàng - literary (“to play”) (colloquial equivalent is {{zh-l|*客佻}})
|mn=qz,xm,zz:goân/tw:goán/oán

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[play]] with; to [[toy]] with
#: {{zh-x|玩 積木|to '''play''' with building blocks}}
# to [[play]]; to [[engage]] in [[sports]] or [[recreational]] [[activities]]
#: {{zh-x|玩 遊戲|to '''play''' games|C}}
#: {{zh-x|玩 音樂|to '''play''' music; to '''perform''' music|C}}
# to [[play]]; to [[have]] a [[good time]]; to have [[fun]]; to [[spend]] [[time]] [[socially]] (e.g. with friends); to [[go out]]
#: {{zh-x|同 朋友 玩|to '''play''' with friends|C}}
#: {{zh-x|去 北京 玩|to travel to Beijing (for a visit)|C}}
# to [[tease]]; to [[trifle]] with
#: {{zh-x|佢 只係 玩 緊 你，唔好 理 佢。|He's just '''teas'''ing you; ignore him.|C}}
